LanguageData.AnimaThrumboHorn.label: anima thrumbo horn
LanguageData.AnimaThrumboHorn.description: An anima thrumbo's horn. It's razor-sharp, rock-hard. This is a true trophy, as well as a deadly melee weapon. Enhances the wielder's psychic sensitivity and neural heat dissipation, allowing more use of psychic powers.
LanguageData.AnimaThrumboHorn.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.AnimaThrumboHorn.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.AnimaWargFang.label: anima warg's razorfang
LanguageData.AnimaWargFang.description: An anima warg's razorfang. It is very durable and sharp.
LanguageData.AnimaWargFang.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.AnimaWargFang.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RazorfangKnife.label: makeshift razorfang knife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RazorfangKnife.description: Makeshift knife made from anima warg's razorfang. The razorfang is simply chipped for sharpness and wrapped with leather as a more comfortable grip.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RazorfangKnife.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RazorfangKnife.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RazorfangKnife.tools.2.label: point
